body: i wasn't sure where to put this so plz don't yell at me :(there is a hacker on walls 6 and he claims he doesn't but all of them do lol can a mod or someone come on and atleats check it out.thanks, micahb222000

title: plz hlp us on walls

replies.body: Man you know forums is not the place for these things, just report the person and if possible record or screen shot their actions incase a mod is too late.
replies.body_tagged: Man you know forums is not the place for these things, just report the person and if possible record or screen shot their actions incase a mod is too late.

replies.body: Do /report in game.. You could also record him hacking and create a player report.
replies.body_tagged: Do /report in game.. You could also record him hacking and create a player report.

replies.body: Use /report in-game, or record him and post it here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47
